jobPost.title: Backend Engineer Learning Infrastructure
jobPost.description: The Hendrix Feature team is dedicated to developing a robust, Spotify-wide platform for machine learning features. This platform streamlines the productionization of ML models by mitigating the incidental complexities involved in creating and maintaining Features, both in their lineage, offline states, and online states.
jobPost.remote_policy: This role is based in Stockholm. We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best! There will be some in person meetings, but still allows for flexibility to work from home. We ask that you come in 2-3 times per week.
